 * @Date: 2020-06-18 16:15:01

import Vue from 'vue'
import Router from 'vue-router'

Vue.use(Router)

export function createRouter () {
    return new Router({
        mode: 'history',
        base: '/Public',
        routes: [
            { path: '/', redirect: '/home' },
            { path: '/home', component: () => import('../views/Home.vue') },
            { path: '/login', component: () => import('../views/Login.vue') },
        ]
    })
}
